snippet: The revivified early-music scene in New York is exemplified by Juilliard’s historical performance program and its professional spawn, the conductorless New York Baroque Incorporated.
abstract: Early-music scene in New York is having a watershed moment, exemplified by Juilliard’s historical performance program and its professional orchestra, the conductorless New York Baroque Incorporated.
lead_paragraph: The revivified early-music scene in New York is exemplified by Juilliard’s historical performance program and its professional spawn, the conductorless New York Baroque Incorporated.

headline.main: A Watershed Moment For Early Music
headline.print_headline: A Watershed Moment For Early Music
